abstract.p: The present invention is systems and methods for trading. In accordance with these systems and methods, a plurality of trader work stations that are connected to a central server may be provided. Through the work stations and central server, the systems and methods may perform participant qualification, instrument creation, bid/offer entry and response, when hit and take, workup, price retention, price improvement, request for market, bid/off restoration, price generation, position conversion, marking to market, and delivery functions.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Systeme und Verfahren für den Handel

abstract.p: The present invention is systems and methods for trading. In accordance with these systems and methods, a plurality of trader work stations that are connected to a central server may be provided. Through the work stations and central server, the systems and methods may perform participant qualification, instrument creation, bid/offer entry and response, when hit and take, workup, price retention, price improvement, request for market, bid/off restoration, price generation, position conversion, marking to market, and delivery functions.

Through the work stations and central server, the systems and methods may perform participant qualification, instrument creation, bid/offer entry and response, when hit and take, workup, price retention, price improvement, request for market, bid/off restoration, price generation, position conversion, marking to market, and delivery functions.

Through the work stations and central server, the systems and methods may perform participant qualification, instrument creation, bid/offer entry and response, when hit and take, workup, price retention, price improvement, request for market, bid/off restoration, price generation, position conversion, marking to market, and delivery functions.

In accordance with these systems and methods, a plurality of trader work stations that are connected to a central server may be provided. Through the work stations and central server, the systems and methods may perform participant qualification, instrument creation, bid/offer entry and response, when hit and take, workup, price retention, price improvement, request for market, bid/off restoration, price generation, position conversion, marking to market, and delivery functions.

nplcit.text: No Search

abstract.p: The present invention is systems and methods for trading. In accordance with these systems and methods, a plurality of trader work stations that are connected to a central server may be provided. Through the work stations and central server, the systems and methods may perform participant qualification, instrument creation, bid/offer entry and response, when hit and take, workup, price retention, price improvement, request for market, bid/off restoration, price generation, position conversion, marking to market, and delivery functions.

L'invention concerne des systèmes et des procédés commerciaux, permettant de fournir une pluralité de stations de travail de commerçant connectées à un serveur central. Ils permettent également par l'intermédiaire desdites stations de travail et dudit serveur central, de qualifier un participant, de créer un instrument, de proposer et de répondre à une offre d'achat/vente, lors de l'acceptation d'une offre d'achat/vente, de la qualification d'un état, du maintien des prix, de l'amélioration des prix, d'une demande de marché, de la restauration d'une offre d'achat/vente, de la génération d'un prix, de la conversion d'une position, d'une mesure de marquage du marché, et la fourniture de fonctions.

L'invention concerne des systèmes et des procédés commerciaux, permettant de fournir une pluralité de stations de travail de commerçant connectées à un serveur central. Ils permettent également par l'intermédiaire desdites stations de travail et dudit serveur central, de qualifier un participant, de créer un instrument, de proposer et de répondre à une offre d'achat/vente, lors de l'acceptation d'une offre d'achat/vente, de la qualification d'un état, du maintien des prix, de l'amélioration des prix, d'une demande de marché, de la restauration d'une offre d'achat/vente, de la génération d'un prix, de la conversion d'une position, d'une mesure de marquage du marché, et la fourniture de fonctions.
